marklogic.body: and lots of us have said foolish things in our past. Lots of us smoke pot. Lots of us do all kinds of things and some of those folks still Act holier than thou. Â Speeding is illegal. So isÂ handicapÂ Spot parking. So isÂ runningÂ a red light. blah blah.Just because someone's opinion differs from yours does not mean you can call them untrustworthy. At least he is open and honest with his opinions on tv, and not just hiding behind text, like most these folks. I'd rather disagree with someone and trust them to be honest, than see someone be a hypocrite or flip flopÂ accordingÂ to public favor.
